00025 #if defined APOXI_UNITTEST_NO_FILENAMES
00026     #define UNITTEST_ERROR(file, line, msg) \
00027         Error();
00028 #elif defined APOXI_UNITTEST_NO_MESSAGES
00029     #define UNITTEST_ERROR(file, line, msg) \
00030         Error(file, line);

00038 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00039     CLAIM_TRUE
00040     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00041 #define CLAIM_TRUE(condition) \
00042     if (!(condition)) { \
00043         UNITTEST_ERROR(__FILE__,__LINE__, #condition);  \
00044         return; \
00045     }
00046 // CLAIM_TRUE
00047 
00048 
00049 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050     CLAIM_TRUE_INFO
00051     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00052 #define CLAIM_TRUE_INFO(condition, msg) \
00053     if (!(condition)) { \
00054         UNITTEST_ERROR(__FILE__,__LINE__, #msg);    \
00055         return; \
00056     }
00057 // CLAIM_TRUE_INFO
00058

00063     if ((condition)) {  \
00064         UNITTEST_ERROR(__FILE__,__LINE__, #condition);  \
00065         return; \
00066     }
00067 // CLAIM_FALSE
00068

00080 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00081     CLAIM_NOT_NULL
00082     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00083 #define CLAIM_NOT_NULL(pointer) \
00084     if (pointer == 0) { \
00085         UNITTEST_ERROR(__FILE__,__LINE__, #pointer);    \
00086         return; \
00087     }
00088 // CLAIM_NOT_NULL

00096         return; \
00097     }
00098 // CLAIM_NOT_NULL_INFO

00120 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00121     APOXI_UNITTEST_INSTANCE_PER_TEST_METODS
00122     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00123 # define APOXI_UNITTEST_INSTANCE_PER_TEST_METHODS(TestClass) \
00124             TestClass* m_single_test_instance; \
00125             void CreateSingleTestInstance() { m_single_test_instance = new TestClass(); } \
00126             TestClass* GetSingleTestInstance() { return m_single_test_instance; } \
00127             void DeleteSingleTestInstance() { delete m_single_test_instance; m_single_test_instance = 0;} \
00128             void SetUnitTestResult (UnitTestResult* test_result) { m_test_result = test_result; } \
00129             BOOLEAN GetCurrentTestSuccess() { return m_current_test_success; } \
00130             void SetCurrentTestSuccess(BOOLEAN current_test_success) { m_current_test_success = current_test_success; } \
00131             \
00132 
00133 // APOXI_UNITTEST_INSTANCE_PER_TEST_METODS
00134

00136     BEGIN_UNITTEST_CLASS
00137     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00138 #ifdef APOXI_UNITTEST_NO_TESTNAMES
00139     #define BEGIN_UNITTEST_CLASS(TestClass) \
00140         public: \
00141             static UnitTest* CreateInstance() { return new TestClass(); } \
00142             static BOOLEAN (*GetDescendantsAccessMethod()) (UINT16, UnitTestSuiteData *) {return 0;}; \
00143         protected: \
00144             APOXI_UNITTEST_INSTANCE_PER_TEST_METHODS(TestClass) \

00146             BOOLEAN _Execute(UnitTestResult& test_result) \
00147             {\
00148                 \
00149                 BOOLEAN success = TRUE;\
00150                 Init();\
00151                 m_test_result = &test_result
00152 #else
00153     #define BEGIN_UNITTEST_CLASS(TestClass) \
00154         public: \
00155             static UnitTest* CreateInstance() { return new TestClass(); } \
00156             static BOOLEAN (*GetDescendantsAccessMethod()) (UINT16, UnitTestSuiteData *) {return 0;}; \
00157             virtual const CHAR* GetName() { return #TestClass; } \
00158             \
00159         protected: \
00160             APOXI_UNITTEST_INSTANCE_PER_TEST_METHODS(TestClass) \
00161 \
00162             BOOLEAN _Execute(UnitTestResult& test_result) \
00163             {\
00164                 \
00165                 BOOLEAN success = TRUE; \
00166                 Init();\
00167                 m_test_result = &test_result
00168 #endif
00169 
00170 // BEGIN_UNITTEST_CLASS
00171 
00172 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00173     ADD_TEST_CASE
00174     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00175 #define ADD_TEST_CASE(TestMethod) \
00176         CreateSingleTestInstance(); \
00177         GetSingleTestInstance()->SetUnitTestResult(&test_result); \
00178         GetSingleTestInstance()->SetCurrentTestSuccess(TRUE); \
00179         GetSingleTestInstance()->EnterSetup(); \
00180         GetSingleTestInstance()->Setup(); \
00181         GetSingleTestInstance()->LeaveSetup(); \
00182         if (!GetSingleTestInstance()->SetupErrorOccured()) { \
00183             GetSingleTestInstance()->TestMethod(); \
00184             if (GetSingleTestInstance()->GetCurrentTestSuccess()) { \
00185                 m_current_test_success = true; \
00186                 test_result.AddSuccess(); \
00187             } \
00188             else { \
00189                 m_current_test_success = false; \
00190                 success = FALSE; \
00191             } \
00192         } \
00193         GetSingleTestInstance()->EnterTeardown(); \
00194         GetSingleTestInstance()->Teardown(); \
00195         GetSingleTestInstance()->LeaveTeardown(); \
00196         DeleteSingleTestInstance();
00197 
00198 // ADD_TEST_CASE
00199 
00200 /*  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
00201     END_UNITTEST_CLASS
00202     ------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00203 #define END_UNITTEST_CLASS \
00204             return success; \
00205                 };
00206 // END_UNITTEST_CLASS

00211 class UnitTestCase : public UnitTest {
00212 
00213     public:
00214 
00215         UnitTestCase() : 
00216           m_in_teardown(false), m_in_setup(false), 
00217           m_teardown_error_occured(false), m_setup_error_occured(false)  
00218         {};
00219         virtual ~UnitTestCase() {};
00220 
00224         virtual void Setup() {};
00228         virtual void Teardown() {};
00229 
00232         virtual void Init() {};
00233 
00238         void EnterSetup() {m_in_setup = true;};
00242         void LeaveSetup() {m_in_setup = false;};
00243 
00245         BOOLEAN SetupErrorOccured() const {return m_setup_error_occured;};
00246 
00250         void EnterTeardown() {m_in_teardown = true;};
00251 
00255         void LeaveTeardown() {m_in_teardown = false;};
00256 
00258         BOOLEAN TeardownErrorOccured() const {return m_teardown_error_occured;};
00259 
00260     protected:
00266 #if defined APOXI_UNITTEST_NO_FILENAMES
00267         void Error();
00268 #elif defined APOXI_UNITTEST_NO_MESSAGES
00269         void Error(const CHAR* file_name, INT line_number);
00270 #else
00271         void Error(const CHAR* file_name, INT line_number, const CHAR* condition);
00272 #endif //APOXI_UNITTEST_NO_FILENAMES,APOXI_UNITTEST_NO_MESSAGES
00273

00276 #endif
00277
